df = get_data()
mu = mean_historical_return(df)
S = sample_cov(df)
ef = EfficientFrontier(mu, S)
w = ef.max_sharpe()
latest_prices = get_latest_prices(df)
da = DiscreteAllocation(w, latest_prices)
da.greedy_portfolio()
np.testing.assert_almost_equal(da._allocation_rmse_error(), 
    0.025762032436733803)
